reviews.review: Игра как 2+2 ничего сложного всё банально и привычно. Команда из 4 человек выносит волны мутантов получая за них деньги, в перерыве между волнами у нас есть возможность пополнить боезапас, купить оружие, бронижелет и вперёд выносить новую волну, а в конце нас ждёт монстр доктор который всю эту кашу и заварил, Патриарх звать его. На этом можно и закончить но есть одно но, конечно же куда без неё без прокачки то, здесь нам дают 7 классов: Медик, Техник, Снайпер, Коммандос, Берсеркер, Поджигатель, Подрывник все те кого мы можем вкачать, к каждому по 6 перков. Вкачиваемся мы логическим образом, снайпер значит стреляем со снайпы, техник с шотгана + двери варит, берсеркер с оружием ближнего боя и т.д В целом игра подразумевает задроство так как с каждым новым уровнем выносить надо всё больше и больше, ещё и подогревает просто громадное кол-во достижений. Рекомендую игру и конечно же играть с реальными людьми в команде, одному тут просто адово скучно.

Viele Zombies, viele Waffen, viele Maps - und wenig Sinn. Wer einen umfangreichen Coop-Zombie-Survival Shooter sucht, der ist fündig geworden. Außerdem liefert der Steam Workshop weitere Zombiearten, Waffen und Maps. Leider fehlt jede Story.
Pretty good. But its only really good if you can find a good team that has mics and knows how to play already. But if you don't as long as people have mics and they are talkative its usually funny.
Awesome gunplay, good level design, nasty specimens to slay! The best co-op survival horror game IMO.

A mediocre horde shooter where you do nothing but shoot and kill the zombies.

That's all well and good, but what kills this game for me is how absolutely SLOW it is.

The game implores Counter Strike movement stylings. If you have a gun out, you walk pretty slowly, but if you have your melee weapon out your fast as shit. I don't believe that works in this styling of game. It ends up being mundanely slow, with even the weakeast of enemies being able to just catch up to you. s'pretty annoying.

The other thing I find wrong is how absolutely over-powered the dlc weapons are. It makes the game a small pay to win based game, and that's bullshit.

However, at the end of the day, this is meant for groups of players/friends killing shit. That's ok in my books, but there's far better games to do that with in my opinion, such as Serious Sam, Painkiller, or even some mods for Doom. Even though I don't RECOMMEND the game, I still do think it's a fairly mediocre survival experience. It's not un-playable by any means, and again it's fun with friends, but it gets incredibly boring rather quickly.

Think of this game as Counter Strike, Doom, and Left 4 Dead mixed together.

A variety of weapons, maps set in different places, and interesting monsters.

This game places a huge emphasis on coop, you got to work together to survive the hoard of monsters.
JOGO MASSA 10/10

Imagine Cod: Zombies. NOW GET THAT SHIT OUT OF YOUR HEAD AND THINK ABOUT A GOOD ZOMBIE SURVIVAL GAME! NOW STOP THINKING ABOUT GOOD ZOMBIE SURVIVAL GAMES AND GO PLAY A KICKASS ZOMBIE SURVIVAL GAME! What may that kickass zombie survival game be, ladies and gentlemen? KILLING FLOOR!

Zombies, guns, funny British humor, what more could you ask for? This game is awesome! This isn't some run-of-the-mill zombie shooter that you see hundreds of times over. No, this game requires you to be smart with your aim, position on the field, and requires you to use your brains unlike other mindless shooters like COD.
A basic first-person zombie shooter, where you can just turn off your brain, and have fun. 2 thumbs up!

At first it seems like a normal game, but after few hours you get caught in all the game mechanics and tactics and you find out there is always something new. You really have to master everything to beat the highest difficulty and with all the DLCs, workshop items, custom maps and holiday events there is a lot of fun waiting for you.
Oldie but goodie.  I keep playing this game years after first buying it. Love this game
Buy it. It's a brutal co - op shooter with awesome theme events and an active community.

Perfect game to play with friends. 6 player co-op and fun as hell!

This is a pretty simple game, premise of the game is you and other people try to survive waves of enemies. Waves get harder as you go on, adding new enemy types and more of them. I praise this game for being old and STILL coming out with new content. New guns, new characters, new maps. And is 6 payer co-op, hard to find that nowadays other then COD. Another thing that is great about this game is the steam workshop, there are tons of mods, guns, and maps on there to keep the game fresh. The last great thing about this game is anyone can run it on their PC because of how little it demands from your computer. However that is the double edged part of this blade, hundreds of hours in this game for me and my friends, they either need to make a sequel or make a serious overhaul patch to it that improve both graphics and physics.

This game is dated but still loads of fun. And 6 player co-op is a serious plus.  8/10

Killing Floor é o jogo de zombie mais louco que alucinante que já joguei ate hoje, cada wave fica mais dificil e o melhor é que não descobri nenhum jeito ainda de enjoar dele, cada classe tem suas vantagens e suas desvantegns, é preciso upar os perks para melhorar sua classe, os novatos não tem nem como jogar em dificuldade grande pois suas classes são fracas, assim dando chance de cada tipo de jogador poder jogar sem ninguem atrapalhar, logico que as vezes vem um e estraga kk, é um jogo ótimo para se jogar com os amigos, mas também é ótimo para jogar sozinho assim aprimora sua sobrevivencia, recomendo treinar bastante estudar os especimens os mapas, descobrir fraquesas, suas forças, descobrir os bugs que possam te ajudar, e boa sorte ! :)

Like L4D, but with more gore and British. Ok, that's a bit too easy.

Killing Floor is a charming zombie (or "zed") survival shooter game in wich you and a couple of other individuals weld doors, insult monsters, die because they CAN'T TAKE IT LIKE A MAN, toss around money and in some cases PANIC PANIC PANIC. 

Unlike L4D, there is a really feeling of accomplishing something when you finished a level. There are also tons of fun weapons, wich all "feel" somewhat different. From the might AA12 to the sophisticated Crossbow, there is something for everyone!

This game will put more hair on your chest then you could ever hope to have..even on women.

please don't play killing floor, ladies :(

То, чем могла стать L4D 2 и, слава Аллаху, не стала. 
Лучший, чем в L4D режим выживания с раза в три большим количеством пушек, большей разнообразностью монстров и карт, не меньшей кровищностью и весельем в наблюдении за последним выжившим членом команды на 7-10 волне. 
А еще разработчикам не так насрать на свою уже, по сути, древнюю игру: по меньшей мере раза три в год добавляют пару карт и кучку оруженек. Однако soldier beware, с недавних пор оруженьки называются Community Weapon Pack и дарятся за деньги. 

Весело, большего от нее и не нужно,
8/10
Probably one of the best zombie/mutant survival games I've played so far...thumbs up for this game!

Addicting, creature-killing, bloody, gorey, decapitating, action game that is simple, yet-complicated. The goal is to survive increasingly difficult waves of messed up creatures with friends or strangers online. It has a ton of maps, and a ton of weapons. There's a perk system, and it's a good one... not intrusive or annoying atall. You can create your own content with the steam workshop and download other people's ideas and use them in game. It's a tiny bit like Left 4 Dead, but certainly unique in it's own right.. BUY THIS GAME!

This survival horror game is normally played in teams of six, killing wave after wave of Zeds along with lots of teamplay and fun.  For different classes and weapons you use, you gain experience and levels to improve your abilities in combat.  It has received many updates, free new maps, weapons expansions, and Steam achievements added over the years - hard to believe it all started as a free UT2K4 mod!
It also includes in-game voice chat, which really helps for any team that plays the higher difficulty maps.
Can't stop killing zombies!  Buy this game if you like online co-op FPS's.

quite scary  well made horror game

Frenetico e Intenso! Cooperativo! O modo Beginner é Dificil, Normal é muito Dificil e o Dificil quase impossivel! Desafiador! Vale cada centavo! Tiro em primeira pessoa! TURNOS com centenas de Zumbis. Muitas Armas. Personagens com Habilidades diferentes. Multiplay e Single-play. Obrigatorio para os fãns de Resident Evil.

I really love this game!

It never ends, you keep fighting wave after wave of zombies. Then when you kill their creator, you go and find another game. Blow them up, set them on fire, unload 30 rounds of ammunition in them, blow their bodies away with shotguns, and cut them down with katanas. Certainly a favorite and it gets better when you fight themed zombies during their spring/summer/halloween events every year.

This game is very good. 

It is still getting some minor updates, however, it is probably not getting more major updates due to killing floor 2. Not counting the discontinuation of regular updates, this is a fun and simple survival game. The welding in particular is a unique concept, though, the game is still pretty simple. There is many gun options, yet, the game still is very simple. While I do recommend it, it might make people who want more complicated mechanics a bit bored. It is a good survival game otherwise.

Man.  Killing Floor.  

Like Counterstrike?  Oh man, is this the game for you.  Didn't like counterstrike, well time to man up.

I like this more than counterstrike, because instead of pitting yourself against neckbeards who've been playing this game for years...you're going against AI zombies.  A lot of them.  This game rewards teamwork and is very well presented.  MUST BUY.  GOAT (game of all time)!

Good Tactical Team Survival FPS.
(With waves: Staging time with Trader, and then Fight Time!) 
Best when multiplayered (with friends), 3-5 team is my favourite size. The sixth slow, while supported by the game mechanics, makes things "too hectic" for me.

Easy to "drop in" (if you have a good team that gives you money if you're a late-comer) and do a few rounds and then log off when other duties call... I like! I recommend.

Great fun!


This game is very fun and i cant stop playing it myself. The game has several different classes for you to choose from and to level up to a maximum of level 6 and once you hit that max level you will be heavily rewarded. It has so many maps that i myself haven't beat them all even though most of my classes are maxed out. The enemies are not the most original but they're neither bad they're intimidating and good for killing! Some people may get bored easily since the game is only co op and you can only do so much but not for me and maybe not for you since i am still playing this after 5 months. The only things i don't like about it is that it is simply only co op i would have loved to see some multiplayer action or a co operative campaign, or being able to play as the ZEDs. Some other issues are that it has several glitches such as headshots not happening, damage glitching, power levelers,and several more. The glitches are no biggy for me at least and the game is very playable. The graphics aren't very nice but they're ok. Overall i give the game a 8.5/10.

Se podría decir que es muy similar al Left for dead, tienes mapas de resistir oleadas o de ir cumpliendo objetivos para poder avanzar por el mapa.
Encuentras armas por el mapa aleatoriamente o bien las puedes comprar en la tienda en cada oleada.
Lo única desventaja es que si no tienes los DLC no puedes utilizar algunas armas, skins de personajes...

No matter what your opinion is on wave-based shooters, there is no doubt that Killing Floor provides some of THE best gunplay in the entire history of video games. That alone is a good enough selling point to shell out a bit of cash on it during a sale. Add to that interesting and varied enemies, great maps that (mostly) prevent camping in one spot, a pretty steep difficulty curve (which is good for 6-player coop), constant updates ever since the game was released, and hilariously over-the-top British voice acting.

But Tripwire, I swear to god, if you make one more fucking purchaseable weapon pack...
Мясо
nipples.

Co-Op survival FPS that pits you against increasing waves of zombie hell spawns. Level up classes/perks to gain benefits which suit your play-style. This game has intense gameplay with dark settings, some which require the use of a flashlight mounted on your weapon just to see.
Want a game where you kill zombie-like creatures and level up for it? Well this game is just for your! It's amazing in every way for you zombie lovers out there so i do infact recommend this to all!

Впринципе обычный Survivor co-op, но меня он чем то взял и если всем она надоедает за 10-20 часов, то я в неё играю уже около 70 часов с другом, и до сих пор нравится, в этой игре есть всё, иногда пугающие моменты, графон средний, система закупки, система прокачки (6 классов - Коммандос, Медик, Подрывник, Поджигатель, Техник, Снайпер) , так же в различных DLC есть дополнительное оружие что делает игру более "секси" :D кароче всем советую ! Пишите в комментариях свои впечатления об этой игре.
